医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
与 COVID-19 大流行相关的经历因看护者教育水平、儿童生命阶段以及城市与农村居住地的不同而有何不同？该研究旨在调查 2019 年冠状病毒病期间美国儿童和护理人员的不同经历。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/How-did-COVID-19-pandemice28093lated-experiences-vary-by-caregiver-education-level-child-life-stage-and-urban-vs-农村住宅.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/How-did-COVID-19-pandemice28093lated-experiences-vary-by-caregiver-education-level-child-life-stage-and-urban-vs-农村住宅.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=659af256-66a5-4332-b428-d2e9f6dbb570 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 06:08:00 -0400 How did COVID-19 pandemic–related experiences vary by caregiver education level, child life stage, and urban vs. rural residence?
Scale Biosciences 推出新型差异化单细胞甲基化和单细胞 RNA 测序解决方案，继续商业扩张利用组合索引技术的单细胞测序创新者 Scale Biosciences, Inc. (ScaleBioTM) 今天宣布扩大其产品组合，以实现更广泛的单细胞组学实验并解锁新的转化研究应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Scale-Biosciences-Continues-Commercial-Expansion-with-Introduction-of-New-and-Differentiated-Single-Cell-Mmethylation-and-Single-Cell- RNA 测序解决方案.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Scale-Biosciences-Continues-Commercial-Expansion-with-Introduction-of-New-and-Differentiated-Single-Cell-Mmethylation-and-Single-Cell- RNA 测序解决方案.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7758c8f5-fe6a-47e3-8a88-c01cc445b78a Wed, 30 Aug 2023 05:41:00 -0400 Scale Biosciences Continues Commercial Expansion with Introduction of New and Differentiated Single Cell Methylation and Single Cell RNA Sequencing Solutions
经过验证的深度学习模型能否促进青少年特发性脊柱侧凸的诊断和治疗？研究人员评估了基于深度学习模型的智能手机应用程序识别青少年特发性脊柱侧凸的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Can-a-validated-deep-learning-model-facilitate-the-diagnosis-and-management-of-adolescent-idiopathic-scoliosis-without-extra-辐射暴露.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Can-a-validated-deep-learning-model-facilitate-the-diagnosis-and-management-of-adolescent-idiopathic-scoliosis-without-extra-辐射暴露.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=836006f7-ad86-4a17-82ed-4e816c100f28 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 05:37:00 -0400 Can a validated deep learning model facilitate the diagnosis and management of adolescent idiopathic scoliosis?
Intellegens 和 CPI 授予 Innovate UK 160 万英镑拨款，用于通过机器学习推进寡核苷酸疗法的生产Intellegens 是一家应用机器学习 (ML) 加速研发创新的公司，今天宣布已获得英国研究与创新 (UKRI) 旗下 Innovate UK 的 160 万英镑拨款，用于将机器学习应用于新兴的寡核苷酸领域疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Intellegens-and-CPI-awarded-c2a316m-Innovate-UK-grant-to-advance-manufacture-of-oligo香 酸-therapeutics-with-machine-learning。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Intellegens-and-CPI-awarded-c2a316m-Innovate-UK-grant-to-advance-manufacture-of-oligo香 酸-therapeutics-with-machine-learning。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39f3aae3-fc87-4612-b00a-99a7b263f2dd Wed, 30 Aug 2023 05:33:00 -0400 Intellegens and CPI awarded £1.6m Innovate UK grant to advance manufacture of oligonucleotide therapeutics with machine learning
CN Bio 任命 Tomasz Kostrzewski 博士为首席科学官CN Bio 是一家设计和制造单器官和多器官微生理系统 (MPS) 的领先器官芯片 (OOC) 公司，今天宣布任命 Tomasz Kostrzewski 博士为首席科学官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/CN-Bio-appoints-Dr-Tomasz-Kostrzewski-as-Chief-Scientific-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/CN-Bio-appoints-Dr-Tomasz-Kostrzewski-as-Chief-Scientific-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec0a44f3-8497-4aa7-a911-23c7fbf7b2e1 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 05:27:00 -0400
针对创伤性分娩的一系列早期心理疗法可能会缓冲 PTSD 的发展研究人员系统回顾并定量评估了预防分娩相关创伤后应激障碍的临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/An-array-of-early-psychological-therapies-in-response-to-traumatic-childbirth-may-buffer-PTSD-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/An-array-of-early-psychological-therapies-in-response-to-traumatic-childbirth-may-buffer-PTSD-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82ff2d8b-59e9-44ee-a921-ca036181e8f6 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 05:14:00 -0400 An array of early psychological therapies in response to traumatic childbirth may buffer PTSD development
在年轻、已故、有症状的接触运动运动员的方便样本中，有哪些神经病理学和临床发现？研究人员描述了遭受重复性头部撞击的年轻大脑捐赠者中慢性创伤性脑病的神经病理学和临床症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/What-are-the-neuropathologic-and-clinical-findings-in-a-convenience-sample-of-young-deceased-symptomatic-contact-sport-运动员.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/What-are-the-neuropathologic-and-clinical-findings-in-a-convenience-sample-of-young-deceased-symptomatic-contact-sport-运动员.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08b5e67a-e732-4dac-bc85-d9881ec17024 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 04:55:00 -0400 What are the neuropathologic and clinical findings in a convenience sample of young, deceased, symptomatic contact sport athletes?
揭示挑战和胜利：密歇根州联邦合格健康中心在实施蓝牙自测血压监测方面所做的努力一组研究人员探索了密歇根州联邦合格健康中心的经验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Unveiling-challenges-and-triumphs-Michigan-Federally-Qualified-Health-Centers-efforts-in-implementing-bluetooth-enabled-self-measured-blood-压力监测.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Unveiling-challenges-and-triumphs-Michigan-Federally-Qualified-Health-Centers-efforts-in-implementing-bluetooth-enabled-self-measured-blood-压力监测.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b4081c6-9501-4cc8-9abd-7db060a4cf0f Wed, 30 Aug 2023 04:44:00 -0400 Unveiling challenges and triumphs: Michigan Federally Qualified Health Centers efforts in implementing bluetooth-enabled self-measured blood pressure monitoring
解锁肿瘤免疫逃避：IL1RL1+ Treg 细胞和 CAF 合作应对免疫治疗耐药性研究人员证明，IL1RL1+ 调节性 T 细胞 (Treg) 和癌症相关成纤维细胞 (CAF) 之间的串扰可驱动组织修复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Unlocking-tumor-immune-evasion-IL1RL12b-Treg-cells-and-CAFs-collaborate-for-immunotherapy-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Unlocking-tumor-immune-evasion-IL1RL12b-Treg-cells-and-CAFs-collaborate-for-immunotherapy-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa7b4135-55a0-4913-9b7e-2c79248579b6 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 03:54:00 -0400 Unlocking tumor immune evasion: IL1RL1+ Treg cells and CAFs collaborate for immunotherapy resistance
AI 聊天机器人提供了错误的癌症治疗建议研究人员评估了大语言模型 (LLM) 在提供癌症治疗建议方面的可靠性，发现聊天机器人的建议中有 33.33% 部分与既定指南不一致。该研究强调，随着人工智能技术渗透到医疗保健决策中，需要谨慎和监管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/AI-chatbot-provides-in Correct-cancer-treatment-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/AI-chatbot-provides-in Correct-cancer-treatment-recommendations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fda3659-8494-402b-aee1-dc81ebf9d2a8 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:59:00 -0400 AI chatbot provides incorrect cancer treatment recommendations
